ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is probably a moot point, since the grant for this seminar has expired. But if it comes back in the future, I have to say this: only take the course if you're ready to take on an additional workload on your way to your dissertation. This is not an extra year (as you have to fit it into your regular academic timetable), but extra work. If it is relevant to what you're doing, go for it. But you will not have the time to "explore" more distant fields and "broaden your horizon."

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: As my previous answers indicate, this did not contribute to my dissertation, but held me back.
